Description: We have a job opening for the position of Female Waitress and are actively seeking candidates preferably fresh graduates can join immediately. Responsibilities for this role include:Greeting and Seating Customers: As a waitress, you will be responsible for welcoming guests, guiding them to their tables, and providing any necessary assistance. Taking Orders: Waitresses are responsible for accurately and efficiently taking food and beverage orders from customers, ensuring they have a pleasant dining experience. Serving Food and Beverages.Skills
Skills: Requirements: Proficiency in the English language is essential.
Candidates of Romanian nationality are welcome to apply.
